inclusion.criterion: Case: ipsilateral carotid stenosis stroke, certified by MRI or CT in the preceding month, with no others causes of stroke
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Control: no clinical sign or MRI hint for a recent stroke
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient affiliated to a social security system or equivalent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Medical history of homolateral carotid surgery, cervical radiation, carotid occlusive, homolateral intracranial stenosis, risk of developing arterial thromboembolic events
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 74M hx of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD was referred to cardiology for evaluation of PVD
